00021 void BreakHere() {
00022     fprintf(stderr, "Dummy Debug Function Execed\n");
00023     return;

00026 char * GetExecName() {
00027   // DUX 4
00028 #if defined(__osf1__)
00029     extern char **__Argv;
00030     return __Argv[0];
00031 #else
00032     return 0;
00033 #endif
00034 }

00036 void AttacheDebuggerHereSigHandler(int sig) {
00037     sig = 0; // avoid compiler warning
00038 }

00041 #if defined(USE_XTERM) || defined(USE_DDD)
00042 void AttachDebuggerHere(char * execname = 0) {
00043     char s[1000];
00044     FILE * fd = NULL;
00045 
00046     if (execname == 0) {
00047         execname = GetExecName();
00048     }
00049 
00050     fd = fopen(BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME, "w");
00051 
00052 #ifdef USE_XTERM
00053     fprintf(fd, "#!/bin/sh\necho \"break BreakHere\ncont\ncont\" > %s.glarp ; (cat %s.glarp - | gdb %s %d) \n",
00054             BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME, BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME, execname, getpid());
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #ifdef USE_DDD
00058     fprintf(fd,"#!/bin/sh\necho \"break BreakHere\ncont\ncont\" > %s.glarp ; (cat %s.glarp | ddd --gdb --tty %s %d) \n",
00059             BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME, BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME, execname, getpid());
00060 #endif
00061 
00062     fclose(fd);
00063     sprintf(s, "chmod +x %s", BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME);
00064     system(s);
00065 
00066     signal(SIGUSR2, &AttacheDebuggerHereSigHandler);
00067 
00068 #ifdef USE_XTERM
00069     sprintf(s, "((xterm -fg cyan -bg black -sl 5000 -T \"Debug %s\" -e  %s) &) ; ((sleep 5; kill -s USR2 %d) &)", 
00070             execname, BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME, getpid());
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 #ifdef USE_DDD
00074     sprintf(s, "( %s &) ; ((sleep 10; kill -s USR2 %d) &)", BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME,getpid());
00075 #endif
00076 
00077     system(s);
00078     pause();
00079     signal(SIGUSR2, SIG_DFL);
00080     sprintf(s, "%s.glarp", BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME);
00081     unlink(BREAK_SCRIPT_NAME);
00082     unlink(s);
00083 }
00084 #endif

00096             execname, getpid());

00098     fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", s);

00115 static FILE * db_file = DEFAULT_DEBUG_PRINT_FILE;
00116 
00117 int MINET_DEBUGLEVEL = ((getenv("MINET_DEBUGLEVEL") == 0) ? DEFAULT_DEBUG_PRINT_LEVEL : atoi(getenv("MINET_DEBUGLEVEL")));
00118 
00119 
00120 void DEBUGSETLEVEL(int level) {
00121     MINET_DEBUGLEVEL = level;
00122 }
00123 
00124 void DEBUGSETFILE(FILE *file) {
00125     db_file = file;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void DEBUGPRINTF(int level, const char * fmt, ...) {
00129     va_list list;
00130 
00131     va_start(list, fmt);
00132 
00133     if (level < MINET_DEBUGLEVEL) {
00134         vfprintf(db_file, fmt, list);
00135     }
00136 }
